Plot: A teenager discovers he's the descendant of a Greek god and sets out on an adventure to settle an on-going battle between the gods.
Title: Percy Jackson & the Olympians: The Lightning Thief
Actors: Logan Lerman, Brandon T. Jackson, Alexandra Daddario, Jake Abel
tomatoConsensus: Though it may seem like just another Harry Potter knockoff, Percy Jackson benefits from a strong supporting cast, a speedy plot, and plenty of fun with Greek mythology.
